channel.title: python on Kei的记录本
channel.description: Recent content in python on Kei的记录本

item.title: Yagmail-邮件发送包
item.description: [1] 包所在地址 https://github.com/kootenpv/yagmail [2] 包安装 pip3 install yagmail [3] 包用法 #!/bin/python3 # 邮件正文，html中嵌入sound,vedio images file contents = ['This is the body, and here is just text http://somedomain/image.png', 'You can find an audio file attached.', '/local/path/song.mp3'] # smtp starttls认证 yag = yagmail.SMTP(user="aaa@163.com",password="123",host="smtp.163.com",port=587,smtp_starttls=True, smtp_ssl=False) # smtp plain认证 yag = yagmail.SMTP(user="aaa@163.com",password="123",host="smtp.163.com",port=25,smtp_starttls=False, smtp_ssl=False) status = yag.send(to="bbb@163.com",title="邮件标题

item.title: The third's Packages for Python3
item.description: python常用第三方包 1.python之邮件发送 yagmail 2.python之MySQL mysql-connector 3.python之表格Openpyxl 4.python之字符命令argparse 5.python之Html及xml文档解析beatifulSoup 6.python之数据库ORM Peewee 7.python之日志logg
